aima.core.agent.impl.aprog
Class SimpleReflexAgentProgram

java.lang.Object
  aima.core.agent.impl.aprog.SimpleReflexAgentProgram
All Implemented Interfaces:
AgentProgram
public class SimpleReflexAgentProgram
extends java.lang.Object
implements AgentProgram

Artificial Intelligence A Modern Approach (3rd Edition): Figure 2.10, page 49.

 function SIMPLE-RELEX-AGENT(percept) returns an action
   persistent: rules, a set of condition-action rules
   
   state  <- INTERPRET-INPUT(percept);
   rule   <- RULE-MATCH(state, rules);
   action <- rule.ACTION;
   return action
Figure 2.10 A simple reflex agent. It acts according to a rule whose condition matches the current state, as defined by the percept.

Author:
Ciaran O'Reilly, Mike Stampone
